title: Enhancement of Cell Harvesting and Storage Facilities for the Department of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This grant was for the purchase of equipment for growing and storing bacteria. There are no findings to report. Other Societal,Economic
findingsText: The equipment has been used by many research groups in the department, which has contributed to numerous publications. The equipment is still in use. Other
